issue.title: [CF 793] UnitCreatureFamily
issue.body:
Was hoping you'd consider implemeting UnitCreatureFamily - http://www.wowpedia.org/API_UnitCreatureFamily


> Posted by CurseForge user Zardilann | Imported from CurseForge issue #793 | Raw

comments.body:
I can't see this getting used enough to warrant implementing it as its own condition type. You can always use a Lua condition for it, though:

``` UnitCreatureFamily("target") == "Wind Serpent" ```

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

Much appreciated. I didn't think about going that way =)

Edit: Very easy to do and works like a charm. Thanks!

Edited Apr 20, 2013

> Posted by CurseForge user Zardilann
